DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Satisfaction With Brief Synchronous Tele-psychiatry Consult
DOC.detailed_description: This pilot aim provide tele-psychiatry consults patient regional Mayo Clinic Florida primary care site . The primary aim study assess impact brief tele-psychiatry consults depression anxiety outcomes patient enrol complex care management ; secondary aim ass patient satisfaction brief tele-psychiatry consults .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1 . Enrolled complex care management 2 . PHQ9 10 GAD7 10 . Exclusion Criteria 1 . Not able provide inform consent 2 . Severe cognitive impairment sensory deficit 3 . Not able understand speak English
